biotools.summary: Free, open source software for analyzing high-throughput data such as NGS. It is available as a ready-to-run virtual machine (VM) containing a large collection of up-to-date analysis tools and reference data, such as Ensembl genomes indexed for aligners. The tools can be used on command line, or via an intuitive client GUI.

bioschemas.name: Chipster
